ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Training Points and Platinum
ygData.msgSnippet: If you have enough points in the skill you are training the cost starts getting significant.  You just never noticed it before.  If you look at the training
ygData.messageBody:
If you have enough points in the skill you are
training the cost starts getting significant. You
just never noticed it before. If you look at the
training box you'll see the cost to the right of the
skill there.

Quwi Changkane, Grandmaster
Fenin Ro
--- Enie <dawn_marie@...> wrote:
> Hi everyone. I just made level 22 last night and
> when I went to get
> training, I had 10pp in my inventory. When I was
> finished I didn't
> have any platinum left. I thought that training used
> your points that
> you got from leveling and didn't cost anything? Can
> someone explain
> why it's costing to train now?
>
>
